title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 585.10 - Off-campus parking
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 585.10 - Off-campus parking

State Regulations
(a) The
college is not responsible for faculty, staff, student and visitor motor
vehicles parked off-campus. (b) The
college will cooperate with the City of Cortland authorities in enforcing
parking and other motor vehicle laws, ordinances, rules, etc. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
585.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
